Sign.desc: Put up a sign above entrance. Sensible advertisement for every brothel that you own. You obviously pay full fee for this only once and then 10% of the fee if you removed the sign for some reason and put it up again.

Flyers.desc: Hire someone to handout flyers in the city. You will pay fee for this service each day

Magazine.desc: Put an advertisement in local 'Playdude' magazine. Target your audience for a modest fee. Will cost you an amount of gold each day

Billboard.desc: Get some pro's to put a large billboard on the road to city. Upkeep and rent will cost you a daily fee

Girl.desc: Hire a pretty girl to attact clients into your buildings. This will cost you 50 once and 150 a day.

Celebrity.desc: Pay a celebrity to come into your building and publicly endorse it! You will pay 5000 once and 1000 a day to keep her.
